title: [Saewehna Lagoon, Shore]
description: The distant sound of crashing waves filters in on the cool night breeze present near the lagoon edge.  Several tall trees provide a backdrop to the shadowed foliage that spreads out from the shore, creating a thick canopy of leaves that sway with the breeze and break the moonlight into variegated shafts of pallid light.

The distant sound of crashing waves filters in on the cooler breeze present near the lagoon edge.  Several tall trees provide a backdrop to the foliage that spreads out from the shore, creating a thick canopy of leaves that sway with the breeze and help to break the sunlight into less intense, variegated shafts of heat.
room.location: the environs of the Saewehna Lagoon
